Introduction¶

This guide covers building web APIs with Python. For more information, see the FastAPI documentation and the PEP 8 style guide.

Getting Started¶

To begin, install the required packages using pip: 

pip install fastapi uvicorn

Then create your first endpoint. See examples for complete code samples.

Basic Example

Here's a simple API endpoint:

from fastapi import FastAPI

app = FastAPI()

@app.get("/")
def read_root():
    return {"Hello": "World"}

Advanced Topics¶

For advanced usage, explore:

  • Authentication patterns
  • SQLAlchemy integration for database access
  • Testing strategies

Performance Considerations

When scaling your API, consider using Redis for caching. The caching guide covers this in detail.
